original_text: Then Jesus returned from the Jordan River. He was full of the Holy Spirit and the Holy Spirit led him into the wilderness.
korean_text: 예수께서 성령의 충만함을 입어 요단 강에서 돌아오사 광야에서 사십 일 동안 성령에게 이끌리시며

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus returned from the Jordan River.
He was full of the Holy Spirit
and the Holy Spirit led him into the wilderness.
